verses.verse: Now there was a man <WH376> of Benjamin <WH1144>, whose name <WH8034> was Kish <WH7027>, the son <WH1121> of Abiel <WH22>, the son <WH1121> of Zeror <WH6872>, the son <WH1121> of Bechorath <WH1064>, the son <WH1121> of Aphiah <WH647>, a Benjamite <WH1145>, a mighty <WH1368> man <WH376> of power <WH2428>. a Benjamite: or, the son of a man of Jemini power: or, substance

And he had a son <WH1121>, whose name <WH8034> was Saul <WH7586>, a choice young man <WH970>, and a goodly <WH2896>: and there was not among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> a goodlier <WH2896> person <WH376> than he: from his shoulders <WH7926> and upward <WH4605> he was higher <WH1364> than any of the people <WH5971>.

And the asses <WH860> of Kish <WH7027> Saul's <WH7586> father <WH1> were lost <WH6>. And Kish <WH7027> said <WH559> to Saul <WH7586> his son <WH1121>, Take <WH3947> now one <WH259> of the servants <WH5288> with thee, and arise <WH6965>, go <WH3212> seek <WH1245> the asses <WH860>.

And he passed through <WH5674> mount <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669>, and passed through <WH5674> the land <WH776> of Shalisha <WH8031>, but they found <WH4672> them not: then they passed through <WH5674> the land <WH776> of Shalim <WH8171>, and there they were not: and he passed through <WH5674> the land <WH776> of the Benjamites <WH1145>, but they found <WH4672> them not.

And when they were come <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Zuph <WH6689>, Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servant <WH5288> that was with him, Come <WH3212>, and let us return <WH7725>; lest my father <WH1> leave <WH2308> caring for the asses <WH860>, and take thought <WH1672> for us.

And he said <WH559> unto him, Behold now, there is in this city <WH5892> a man <WH376> of God <WH430>, and he is an honourable <WH3513> man <WH376>; all that he saith <WH1696> cometh <WH935> surely to pass <WH935>: now let us go <WH3212> thither; peradventure he can shew <WH5046> us our way <WH1870> that we should go <WH1980>.

Then said <WH559> Saul <WH7586> to his servant <WH5288>, But, behold, if we go <WH3212>, what shall we bring <WH935> the man <WH376>? for the bread <WH3899> is spent <WH235> in our vessels <WH3627>, and there is not a present <WH8670> to bring <WH935> to the man <WH376> of God <WH430>: what have we? is spent: Heb. is gone out of, etc have we: Heb. is with us?

And the servant <WH5288> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586> again <WH3254>, and said <WH559>, Behold, I have <WH4672> here at hand <WH3027> the fourth part <WH7253> of a shekel <WH8255> of silver <WH3701>: that will I give <WH5414> to the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, to tell <WH5046> us our way <WH1870>. I have: Heb. there is found in my hand

(Beforetime <WH6440> in Israel <WH3478>, when a man <WH376> went <WH3212> to enquire <WH1875> of God <WH430>, thus he spake <WH559>, Come <WH3212>, and let us go <WH3212> to the seer <WH7200>: for he that is now <WH3117> called a Prophet <WH5030> was beforetime <WH6440> called <WH7121> a Seer <WH7200>.)

Then said <WH1697> Saul <WH7586> to his servant <WH5288>, Well <WH2896> said <WH559>; come <WH3212>, let us go <WH3212>. So they went <WH3212> unto the city <WH5892> where the man <WH376> of God <WH430> was. Well said: Heb. Thy word is good

And as they went up <WH5927> the hill <WH4608> to the city <WH5892>, they found <WH4672> young maidens <WH5291> going out <WH3318> to draw <WH7579> water <WH4325>, and said <WH559> unto them, Is <WH3426> the seer <WH7200> here? the hill: Heb. in the ascent of the city

And they answered <WH6030> them, and said <WH559>, He is <WH3426>; behold, he is before <WH6440> you: make haste <WH4116> now, for he came <WH935> to day <WH3117> to the city <WH5892>; for there is a sacrifice <WH2077> of the people <WH5971> to day <WH3117> in the high place <WH1116>: sacrifice: or, feast

As soon as ye be come <WH935> into the city <WH5892>, ye shall straightway <WH3651> find <WH4672> him, before he go up <WH5927> to the high place <WH1116> to eat <WH398>: for the people <WH5971> will not eat <WH398> until he come <WH935>, because he doth bless <WH1288> the sacrifice <WH2077>; and afterwards <WH310> <WH3651> they eat <WH398> that be bidden <WH7121>. Now therefore get you up <WH5927>; for about this time <WH3117> ye shall find <WH4672> him. this time: Heb. to day

And they went up <WH5927> into <WH8432> the city <WH5892>: and when they were come <WH935> into the city <WH5892>, behold, Samuel <WH8050> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> them, for to go up <WH5927> to the high place <WH1116>.
Now the LORD <WH3068> had told <WH1540> Samuel <WH8050> in his ear <WH241> a <WH259> day <WH3117> before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586> came <WH935>, saying <WH559>, told: Heb. revealed the ear of Samuel

To morrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256> I will send <WH7971> thee a man <WH376> out of the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and thou shalt anoint <WH4886> him to be captain <WH5057> over my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>, that he may save <WH3467> my people <WH5971> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>: for I have looked <WH7200> upon my people <WH5971>, because their cry <WH6818> is come <WH935> unto me.

And when Samuel <WH8050> saw <WH7200> Saul <WH7586>, the LORD <WH3068> said <WH6030> unto him, Behold the man <WH376> whom I spake <WH559> to thee of! this same shall reign <WH6113> over my people <WH5971>. reign over: Heb. restrain in
Then Saul <WH7586> drew near <WH5066> to Samuel <WH8050> in <WH8432> the gate <WH8179>, and said <WH559>, Tell <WH5046> me, I pray thee, where <WH335> the seer's <WH7200> house <WH1004> is.

And Samuel <WH8050> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586>, and said <WH559>, I am the seer <WH7200>: go up <WH5927> before <WH6440> me unto the high place <WH1116>; for ye shall eat <WH398> with me to day <WH3117>, and to morrow <WH1242> I will let thee go <WH7971>, and will tell <WH5046> thee all that is in thine heart <WH3824>.

And as for thine asses <WH860> that were lost <WH6> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ago <WH3117>, set <WH7760> not thy mind <WH3820> on them; for they are found <WH4672>. And on whom is all the desire <WH2532> of Israel <WH3478>? Is it not on thee, and on all thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004>? three: Heb. to day three days

And Saul <WH7586> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, Am not I a Benjamite <WH1145>, of the smallest <WH6996> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>? and my family <WH4940> the least <WH6810> of all the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144>? wherefore then speakest <WH1696> thou so <WH1697> to me? so: Heb. according to this word

And Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> Saul <WH7586> and his servant <WH5288>, and brought <WH935> them into the parlour <WH3957>, and made them sit <WH5414> in the chiefest <WH7218> place <WH4725> among them that were bidden <WH7121>, which were about thirty <WH7970> persons <WH376>.
And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> unto the cook <WH2876>, Bring <WH5414> the portion <WH4490> which I gave <WH5414> thee, of which I said <WH559> unto thee, Set <WH7760> it by thee.

And the cook <WH2876> took up <WH7311> the shoulder <WH7785>, and that which was upon it, and set <WH7760> it before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586>. And Samuel said <WH559>, Behold that which is left <WH7604>! set <WH7760> it before <WH6440> thee, and eat <WH398>: for unto this time <WH4150> hath it been kept <WH8104> for thee since I said <WH559>, I have invited <WH7121> the people <WH5971>. So Saul <WH7586> did eat <WH398> with Samuel <WH8050> that day <WH3117>. left: or, reserved
And when they were come down <WH3381> from the high place <WH1116> into the city <WH5892>, Samuel communed <WH1696> with Saul <WH7586> upon the top of the house <WH1406>.

And they arose early <WH7925>: and it came to pass about the spring <WH5927> of the day <WH7837>, that Samuel <WH8050> called <WH7121> Saul <WH7586> to the top of the house <WH1406>, saying <WH559>, Up <WH6965>, that I may send thee away <WH7971>. And Saul <WH7586> arose <WH6965>, and they went out <WH3318> both <WH8147> of them, he and Samuel <WH8050>, abroad <WH2351>.

And as they were going down <WH3381> to the end <WH7097> of the city <WH5892>, Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Saul <WH7586>, Bid <WH559> the servant <WH5288> pass on <WH5674> before <WH6440> us, (and he passed on <WH5674>,) but stand <WH5975> thou still a while <WH3117>, that I may shew <WH8085> thee the word <WH1697> of God <WH430>. a while: Heb. to day
